body:
If you try making a reply to another comment, it won't show up on your profile or the thread. It can only be accessed by clicking the direct permalink of the comment it was replied to, and the reply comment has no permalink (it just reloads the current page).

Also, if you got a reply to one of your comments in your inbox, it will create a notification, but since it's broken it'll cause you to get a 500 error when trying to access the page.

This should be fixed soon. In the meantime, if you're wondering why your inbox is broken and why your comments are missing, this is why.

Edit: this is now fixed!
body_html:
If you try making a reply to another comment, it won't show up on your profile or the thread. It can only be accessed by clicking the direct permalink of the comment it was replied to, and the reply comment has no permalink (it just reloads the current page).

Also, if you got a reply to one of your comments in your inbox, it will create a notification, but since it's broken it'll cause you to get a 500 error when trying to access the page.

This should be fixed soon. In the meantime, if you're wondering why your inbox is broken and why your comments are missing, this is why.

Edit: this is now fixed!

guild.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs

title: PSA: Comment replies are broken atm

body: Yeah I've noticed a comment missing on profile, but couldn't tell anything else was wrong, as it was deep enough in the thread where you have to view "more comments ->" to see it. And there it's visible not only when viewing the comment it was a reply to, but also when looking at a few comments further up the thread, if that makes sense.
body_html: Yeah I've noticed a comment missing on profile, but couldn't tell anything else was wrong, as it was deep enough in the thread where you have to view "more comments ->" to see it. And there it's visible not only when viewing the comment it was a reply to, but also when looking at a few comments further up the thread, if that makes sense.
